ygData.messageBody:
> It's more cost effective to work your skill to 135 and then start making
> cloaks. At skill lvl 145, you'll be making them with about a 30%
> success (or
> so I'm led to believe; could be wrong though).

My skill is at 122. I can't find needle molds (although the thimble molds
are near the forge in East Freeport), at least on E. Marr. My intelligence
is tweaked at like 165 and my wisdom is about 90 (I have several nice stat
items, hehehe), yet I'm still having trouble breaking even selling banded
because of all the failures. I can make anything up to a coif with a normal
amount of failures but mantles, belts, leggings and tunics kill me (maybe
30% success on the mantle and belts and 20% on the leggings and tunics. I
have been completely unsuccessful making cloaks (8 attempts all failures).
Is this normal? Would working my skill to 135 fix this? What is everyone
elses experiencing with success rates since this weeks patch?

Anyone know where I can find both the needle and thimble molds, preferably
near Freeport?
